description: Fired when a new NEP-141 token contract is created
sql_insert: INSERT INTO newcontract_nep141 (timestamp, transaction_id, receipt_id, block_height, account_id) SELECT to_timestamp((value->>'block_timestamp_nanosec')::bigint / 1000000000.0), value->>'transaction_id', value->>'receipt_id', (value->>'block_height')::bigint, value->>'account_id' FROM jsonb_array_elements($1);

endpoints.query: SELECT json_build_object('id', id, 'timestamp', timestamp, 'transaction_id', transaction_id, 'receipt_id', receipt_id, 'block_height', block_height, 'account_id', account_id) FROM newcontract_nep141 WHERE (($1->>'before_id')::bigint IS NULL OR id < ($1->>'before_id')::bigint) ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 50;

SELECT json_build_object('id', id, 'timestamp', timestamp, 'transaction_id', transaction_id, 'receipt_id', receipt_id, 'block_height', block_height, 'account_id', account_id) FROM newcontract_nep141 WHERE (($1->>'after_id')::bigint IS NULL OR id > ($1->>'after_id')::bigint) ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 50;
